a variable is not taken into account when put in a request name. It was working

test plan working on 2.0.3 and not on 2.1

text:
Can't use the test plan, as it relies on a local web-server.

However, I created what appears to be a similar plan using JavaTest samplers.
This does indeed fail in 2.1, but works in the 2.1 branch, so it looks as though
the problem has been fixed, and will appear in 2.1.1 shortly.

Could you perhaps the 2-1.20050913 build in the nightly directory:
http://cvs.apache.org/builds/jakarta-jmeter/nightly/ and let us know if that
solves the problem?
creator: sebb@apache.org

text: Tried with the 2-1.20050913 build and it worked.
creator: nono_is_here@hotmail.com
